unnormalised: Ugh, I went to the wrong Forex counter at the Delhi airport last week. They were offering a terrible exchange rate – only ₹82 per 1 USD! Ended up exchanging only $50 for ₹4100. Next time, I'm definitely checking online rates first; heard some counters offer better deals around ₹83.50 per dollar. Lesson learned: always compare before you convert!
normalised: Ugh, I went to the wrong Forex counter at the Delhi airport last week. They were offering a terrible exchange rate – only rupee eighty two per one U-S-D! Ended up exchanging only dollar fifty for rupee four thousand one hundred. Next time, I'm definitely checking online rates first; heard some counters offer better deals around rupee eighty three point five zero per dollar. Lesson learned: always compare before you convert!
